price: Jin dãɗi ne a cikin dũniya, sa'an nan kuma makõmarsu zuwa gare Mu take, sa'an nan Mu ɗanɗana musu azãba mai tsanani sabõda abin da suka kasance sunã yi na kãfirci.
arabic: مَتَٰعٞ فِي ٱلدُّنۡيَا ثُمَّ إِلَيۡنَا مَرۡجِعُهُمۡ ثُمَّ نُذِيقُهُمُ ٱلۡعَذَابَ ٱلشَّدِيدَ بِمَا كَانُواْ يَكۡفُرُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: matāʿun fī al-dun'yā thumma ilaynā marjiʿuhum thumma nudhīquhumu al-ʿadhāba al-shadīda bimā kānū yakfurūna
